fullDescription.intro: This node allows to separate hilited from non-hilit rows from the input data at the time of execution. Both tables are then passed to the outports. Note, if the hilite status changes after execution the data tables at the outports does not change anymore. Therefore the node needs to be re-executed.

ports.dataOut: The filtered output table containing hilited rows only.
The filtered output table containing non-hilit rows only.
